verses.name: Esther 7:1
verses.text: So the king and Haman came to banquet with Esther the queen.

verses.name: Esther 7:2
verses.text: And the king said again unto Esther on the second day at the banquet of wine, What is thy petition, queen Esther? and it shall be granted thee: and what is thy request? and it shall be performed, even to the half of the kingdom.

verses.name: Esther 7:3
verses.text: Then Esther the queen answered and said, If I have found favour in thy sight, O king, and if it please the king, let my life be given me at my petition, and my people at my request:
